Instruction: Cook the ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes. Add diced onions and red bell pepper, and continue cooking for another 5 minutes or until the onion is tender. Drain any excess fat from the skillet.
Combine tomato sauce and eggs in a bowl and mix thoroughly before adding to the pan. Stir together for 2 minutes or until the sauce is thickened. Then, gently add the bread cubes to the pan.
